FuncDef: The display ospf traffic-adjustment command displays OSPF process-specific tunnel information relevant to traffic adjustment (using IGP shortcut or forwarding adjacency).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the OSPF process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295. If no process ID is specified, information about all OSPF processes is displayed.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When too many information is displayed, you can select begin, exclude, or include to specify the matching condition to filter the display information.
